name: Wormhole 'Em Up
description:
Shoot enemies with their own bullets!

How? You have two ships, each projecting one end of a one-way wormhole. Catch bullets and even entire enemy attackers and throw them back at other attackers!

WASD and arrow keys/left and right joysticks to control the two ships.

The game will restart automatically on death. The high score is saved to %appdata%\Godot\app_userdata\Godot\highscores.txt. No other files are saved to the computer besides this and the initial download.

Created for the Brackeys Jam 2020.1 in under 1 week by Supbscripter (https://github.com/Supbscripter) and cdrch (https://github.com/cdrch).
